name: The First Sword of Earth
author: 两只猫先生
content: Wang Sheng was unexpectedly reborn to the night before the sudden increase in spiritual energy on earth. &quotI am not going to be mediocre and looked down on by others like in my previous life.&quot And so, he decided to go to Wudang to pay homage to his master from his previous life. And thus the daily life of the path to immortality begins...
